Posts.Title: Wish all docs spoke the same language amhess amhess

Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2016 10:02PM amhess wrote: Hello! I'm Amanda. I'm 32and waiting for my biopsy(scheduled for Monday). And my mom was diagnosed in 2010. Weird things to bond over but I'm here if you want to talk. I have a 4cm solid palpable lump vu-raids rating 4,and the surgeon is "very worried". I get the feeling lost. Being scared in your own mind is hard. I joined yesterday and just reading makes me feel less alone even without any answers yet. I don't know much but... When I was 19 I got stretch marks in both breasts and I was a size 3 then. My breasts have always slightly different in size. Just recently my left one started getting squared at the bottom.  As for the mammogram results, I had sonogram and results on the same day.  Good luck to you
Posts.Title: I feel lost Hoping4thebest32 amhess
